meanings.definition: A person who supervises the brewing of beer.
meanings.sent1: The brewmaster carefully oversees the beer-making process.
meanings.sent2: At the brewery, the brewmaster is in charge of creating new beer recipes.
meanings.sent3: The brewmaster joked that he had a 'brew-tiful' day at work.
meanings.sent4: In the world of beer, the brewmaster is like a conductor leading a symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent5: With his expertise, the brewmaster turned simple ingredients into a masterpiece of beer.

meanings.definition: The head brewer at a brewery.
meanings.sent1: Every brewery needs a skilled brewmaster to create delicious beers.
meanings.sent2: The brewmaster's innovative recipes set the brewery apart from others.
meanings.sent3: The brewmaster playfully referred to himself as the 'beer boss.'
meanings.sent4: To the brewery staff, the brewmaster was a wizard who brewed magic in every batch.
meanings.sent5: Under the guidance of the brewmaster, the brewery flourished with unique brews.
